actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Immigration and Refugee Affairs.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Immigration and Refugee Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Immigration Act of 1990 to increase the number of qualified immigrants from certain adversely affected foreign states who may be admitted to the United States.

summary.text: Amends the Immigration Act of 1990 to: (1) increase the number of immigrant visas available to nationals of adversely affected foreign states; and (2) extend such admissions category through FY 1996.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Immigration Act of 1990 to increase the number of qualified immigrants from certain adversely affected foreign states who may be admitted to the United States.
